name: SynchroCoin
description: The SynchroCoin is an Ethereum-based token used by SynchroLife. SynchroLife is digitally transforming marketing in the restaurant industry to benefit both restaurants and consumers. SynchroLife offers flat rate, risk free, automated big data-based CRM tools for restaurants and uses a percentage of revenue from these restaurant partners to buy back SynchroCoin to reward consumers who leave reviews and dine at partner restaurants. As SynchroLife's partner restaurants and mobile app users grow, the SynchroLife token economy spins and the SynchroCoin grows.
